name: Arena Trials
description:
ARENA TRIALS

You have the options of three characters:

  1. Knight

  2. Mage

  3. Cleric

    4. Fight in a closed off arena and prove your worth.

    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

    This was a small project I intended to work on for only a month. However it has been a little over a month. I only plan on adding 2 more levels and tweek the mechanics if players feel something is too powerful or too weak. So I would appreciate any feedback you can give me.

    I don't think I'll be adding sound or music to this game as they require too much time for what it's worth right now.

    Level 0 Is your tutorial.

    PC & Web: Use AWSD to move your character and 1,2,3,4 to select your items.  Spacebar to use the item.

    Android: The left side of the screen has a joystick. You can simply tap the item to use them.
